## IJControllerItem interface

控制器项接口. 继承于 IJElement`<HTMLDivElement>` 包含了一系列属性以及和拖拽相关的方法.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IJControllerItem extends IJElement`<HTMLDivElement>` 
```
**Extends:** [IJElement](./j-html-design-editor.ijelement.md)<!-- -->&lt;HTMLDivElement&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [dir](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.dir.md) |  | ItemType \| string | 控制器的方向（在画布中的位置） |
|  [dragStartPosition](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.dragstartposition.md) |  |` { x: number; y: number; } `| 拖拽开始的位置 |
|  [editor](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.editor.md) |  | [IJEditor](./j-html-design-editor.ijeditor.md) | 控制器关联的编辑器 |
|  [size](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.size.md) |  | number | 控制器的尺寸 |

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
